parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description:
The number of results for each query.

Valid values: 10 to 100. Default value: 10.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: Query token, which is the NextToken value returned from the previous API call.

parameters.name: ResourceIds
parameters.description: The ID information of the file system and virtual storage channel. Each batch can contain up to 10 IDs.
